CustomField.description: AI model's confidence score for this execution step (0-100). Higher values indicate greater certainty in the action taken. Extracted from the LLM's _confidence parameter when TrackConfidence is enabled on the capability. Use this to analyze AI decision quality, identify uncertain actions, and track confidence patterns over time.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: AI confidence level: 90-100 (Very confident), 70-89 (Confident), 50-69 (Uncertain), Below 50 (Not confident). Blank means confidence tracking was not enabled.
CustomField.label: Confidence Score
